summary: The Postal Supervisors and Managers Fairness Act of 2025 aims to modify the procedures for negotiating pay and benefits for supervisory and managerial personnel within the United States Postal Service. The bill amends Title 39 of the United States Code, specifically section 1004, to establish timelines and processes for the Postal Service to propose changes to pay and benefit programs, and for dispute resolution between the Postal Service and supervisors' organizations. It covers issues such as supervisors' pay and benefits programs and collective bargaining agreements that impact those benefits, as well as the dispute resolution process.
